GET http://localhost:4200/get
GET http://localhost:4200/status/404
GET http://localhost:4200/status/201
GET http://localhost:4200/status/503
PUT http://localhost:4200/put { "some" : "put" }
POST http://localhost:4200/post { "some" : "post" }
DELETE http://localhost:4200/delete
patch http://localhost:4200/patch { "some" : "patch" }
